name: General Checkup
description: A routine health examination to assess overall well-being and detect potential health issues.

name: Dental Care
description: Comprehensive dental services including cleanings, fillings, and oral health assessments.

name: Pediatric Care
description: Specialized medical care for infants, children, and adolescents, ensuring their health and development.

name: Emergency Medicine
description: Immediate medical care for critical conditions, injuries, and life-threatening emergencies.

name: Women's Health
description: Comprehensive healthcare services addressing women's unique health needs and concerns.

name: Radiology Services
description: Diagnostic imaging services, including X-rays, CT scans, and MRI examinations.

name: Cardiology
description: Specialized care for heart-related issues, including diagnostic tests and treatment plans.

name: Mental Health Counseling
description: Therapeutic services for individuals facing mental health challenges, offering counseling and support.

name: Orthopedic Services
description: Medical care focused on the musculoskeletal system, addressing bone, joint, and muscle conditions.
